short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A place for the right price

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Hypinion for Chrome - Track your ability to estimate residential real estate sales prices and closing dates.

When you think you are residential real estate expert and you want to prove it.
 
Hypinion is a fun and engaging way to keep you in the game of real estate by tracking your opinions on how well and for what price a property will sell - or not.
 
In our first release users can find active, For Sale, properties across all 50 states on Movoto.com. 
 
View an active property listing on Movoto.com and the Hypinion extension will prompt you to provide your guess. 
Will the property sell? Or will it be canceled or withdrawn?
Guess if it will be price reduced before the sale
Guess the contract date
Guess the close date
Guess 
When the property is closed and you revisit the property page we will show you how you scored. The more accurate your guesses are the higher your score is.
You can review all your entries on hypinion.com/results
